Articles.Content:
Hello All,

I am looking for a few suggestions for addons with cargo bays. Currently, I got B9 Aerospace and Jarfrs Strut Packs, which both have bays in them.

One thats been of particular interest is a open bay that has a pair of cylinders at each end which are both connected by beams. I've seen it in a few screen-shots and videos, and some list mods used but I've gone through the mods and still haven't been able to find it.
